name: Lawless Shooting Range VR
description:
THIS IS A VR GAME.

This is my final project for the Unity XR course at Nucleo escuela, it is a mini game, shooting range type set in the old west.

The objective is to stay alive and eliminate as many enemies as possible. You must keep in mind that every N seconds the difficulty level increases and your gun has limited bullets, so you must pick up bullets from the bag on your left and reload your gun.

It is the first version and it still lacks several things, the short term improvements will be:

- Delimit the playing field.

- Add a bartender to throw a drink to recover life.

- Improve the points system, with improvements such as saving points between games, and points for combos.

- Implement headshots.

- Improve performance.
